package.name: HS.Ryu006 Fluid Widget
package.shortDescription: This is a XenHTML Wallpaper that reacts to your touches!

descriptionlist.description: This is a XenHTML Wallpaper that reacts to your touches!
It's only for HOMESCREEN as on LOCKSCREEN it's glitchy.
A Transparent version is also included!

screenshot.description: This is how it'll look like.
